episodes.title: JW. org - Prepares to Change 1914?
episodes.description:
Appendix B1 of the revised New World Translation (2013) is puzzling. There is no reference to Jesus' supposed enthronement as heavenly King in 1914. There is only a very vague reference to Satan being cast to earth "about" 1914. It looks like this revison has been future proofed. What do you think?

In the past Jehovah's Witnesses who did not accept the 1914 date were considered apostate and disfellowshipped.  A question from readers article in the 1986 April 1 Watchtower, page 31 ,  stated, "Approved association with Jehovah's Witnesses requires accepting the entire range of the true teachings of the Bible, including those Scriptural beliefs that are unique to Jehovah's Witnesses. What do such beliefs include?.......That 1914 marked the end of the Gentile Times and the establishment of the Kingdom of God in the heavens, as well as the time for Christ's foretold presence."
